channel.title: Elasticsearch on Rimon's Weblog
channel.description: Recent content in Elasticsearch on Rimon's Weblog

item.title: Installing and Running Elasticsearch
item.description: “tagline”: “You Know, for Search” _This article is part of a series. Check out the full series [icon name=“external-link” class=“” unprefixedclass=“”] The easiest way to understand what Elasticsearch is to play with it, so let’s get started. Elastic search is easy to install. In this tutorial, I will walk you through the elasticsearch installation process in Ubuntu 16.04. Elasticsearch requires a recent version of java. Oracle JDK version 1.8 is recommended.

item.title: Basics and Key Concepts of Elasticsearch
item.description: Getting Started with Elasticsearch Basics _This article is part of a series. Check out the full series [icon name=“external-link” class=“” unprefixedclass=“”] This week finally I started learning Elasticsearch, I decided to keep some notes and share my concepts and understanding on this blog. So that if anyone wants to learn Elasticsearch he/she can learn with me. In this part, I will write about the some Elasticsearch theory and basic concepts anyone needs to understand.
